bio: I'm @0xNing0x, formerly a Poloniex industry analyst, now with a cryptocurrency fund. I'm dedicated to spreading crypto knowledge through my Twitter account
contributionDescription: I have written an educational piece for the Optimism Collective, providing in-depth insights into important Optimism Collective concepts. I believe that this information will be instrumental in understanding the development of Optimism,OP Stack and other cryptocurrency technologies.
